name: Dōkutsu Project
description:
Dōkutsu Project is a Danmaku plateformer not too hard (I think..)

The game is not finished because I only had 10 days.

I didn't have the time to make all ost, only the bosses musics are in the game

If you like the game maybe I'll finish it

Submission for Magical Girl Game Jam #7

Update : I found some minor bugs that I hadn't noticed while retesting the game, I'll make a little update tomorrow!
